bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Planning and Designing Transition Facilities between Overhead and Underground Transmission Lines
IEEE Draft Guide for Planning and Designing Transition Facilities between Overhead and Underground Transmission Lines

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Careful consideration of the physical and electrical characteristics of overhead lines and transmission cables are necessary in designing a transitio structure between the two systems. Environmental and social factors also play a role in designing a transition. By considering the factors contained in this Guide, the user will be better able to design a suitable transition that balances cost, operability, environmental factors, and future flexibility.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
